Title: Plaquemines LNG ramps up exports in February as final Phase 1 trains start operations
Description: US LNG exporter Venture Globalâ€™s Plaquemines LNG export plant in Louisiana increased its shipments in February, continuing its ramp-up after exporting its first cargo in December.
Author: CK

Title: GTA FLNG loads partial cargo on British Sponsor; laden tanker idles near hub
Description: The BP-operated Greater Tortue Ahmeyim floating LNG project has loaded a partial LNG cargo on the BP-controlled 173,400 m3 British Sponsor LNG tanker, marking a milestone for the new project that sits on the maritime border between Mauritania and Senegal, according to Kpler data.
Author: CK
